entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except north 40 km/h over southern sections. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except north 60 km/h over southern sections. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 over southern sections. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023
